titles.title: Gazing on the Lord in glory

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Gazing on the Lord in glory, While our hearts in worship bow, There we read the wondrous story Of the cross—its shame and woe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Every mark of dark dishonor Heaped upon the thorn-crowned brow All the depths of Thy heart’s sorrow Told in answ’ring glory now.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: On that cross, alone, forsaken, Where no pity’ng eye was found; Now, to God’s right hand exalted, With Thy praise the heavens resound.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Did Thy God e’en then forsake Thee, Hide His face from Thy deep need? In Thy face once marred and smitten, All His glory now we read.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Gazing on it we adore Thee, Blessed, precious, holy Lord; Thou the Lamb, alone art worthy— This be earth’s and heaven’s accord.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Rise our hearts, and bless the Father, Ceaseless song e’en here begun, Endless praise and adoration To the Father and the Son.
